examples.text: When should I book my flight?
What's the cheapest time to fly?
Best time to buy tickets from New York to Miami
I need the best deal on a flight
When can I get the lowest prices for a flight?
What month should I book my vacation flight?
Looking for the optimal time to purchase airline tickets
When are flights to Europe cheapest?

intents.description: User wants to find the best time to book flights

examples.text: What's the best airline for international flights?
Do any airlines offer free bags?
Which carrier has the best on-time record?
Tell me about low cost carriers
Which airline has the most legroom?

intents.description: User is asking about airline information

examples.text: How many bags can I check?
Do I have to pay for carry-on?
How much luggage can I bring?

intents.description: User is asking about baggage policies

examples.text: Do students get discounts on flights?
Are there special fares for college students?
How can I get a student discount?
Is there a youth fare available?
Do I need a student ID to get discounted flights?
How much can students save on airfare?

intents.description: User is asking about student discounts

examples.text: How do I use this bot?
Tell me how to use FlightSavvy
Show me what you can do

intents.description: User is asking for help with the bot

examples.text: I want to search for a different flight

intents.description: User wants to reset the conversation and start over

values.text: üëã Welcome to FlightSavvy! I can help you find the best time to book flights for the lowest prices. How can I assist you today?
Hello! I'm your FlightSavvy assistant. I can help you find the best time to book flights, compare airlines, check baggage policies, and more. How can I help you today?
I can help you find the best time to book a flight. To get started, where are you flying from?
I need to know where you are departing from. For example, "New York" or "Chicago".
Great! You're flying from @city. Where would you like to fly to?
I need to know where you're departing from. For example, "New York" or "Chicago".
<?@city? 'Flying from ' + $origin + ' to ' + @city + '. When are you planning to travel? (e.g., "June" or "December to January")' : 'Please tell me your destination city.' ?>
<?@month? 'Got it! Do you have any preferred airlines? If not, just say "no preference".' : 'Please specify when you want to travel, for example "June" or "December to February".' ?>
Are you traveling as an adult, child, or student? Student status might qualify you for additional discounts.
What level of price analysis would you prefer: monthly, quarterly, weekly, or daily? Monthly is our standard recommendation.
Thanks for all the information! I'm now analyzing flight prices for $origin to $destination during $start_month<?$start_month != $end_month? ' to ' + $end_month : ''?>...
One moment while I search for the best flight deals...

‚úÖ Flight Price Analysis: $origin to $destination

‚úàÔ∏è Best time to book: $prediction_result.formatted_best_time

üí∞ Expected fare: $<?$prediction_result.best_time.predicted_fare.toFixed(2)?>

<?$passenger_type == 'student'? 'üéì Note: Students may qualify for additional 10-15% discounts

' : ''?>Recommendations:
‚Ä¢ Book during this period for optimal prices
‚Ä¢ Consider mid-week departures for additional savings
‚Ä¢ Flexible dates can save you even more

Would you like to analyze another route?
I'm sorry, but I couldn't get price predictions for that route. This may be due to limited data. Would you like to try a different route?

Here's some information about airlines:

‚Ä¢ Budget carriers like Spirit, Frontier and Southwest typically offer the lowest base fares
‚Ä¢ Delta, American, and United are full-service carriers with more amenities
‚Ä¢ Southwest offers 2 free checked bags
‚Ä¢ Budget carriers often charge for carry-on bags and seat selection
‚Ä¢ JetBlue offers more legroom in standard economy than other US carriers

Would you like to know about a specific airline?

Most airlines allow 1 personal item and 1 carry-on bag for free. For checked bags:

‚Ä¢ Southwest: 2 free checked bags
‚Ä¢ Delta, American, United: First bag $30-35, second bag $40-45
‚Ä¢ Budget airlines (Spirit, Frontier): Charges for all bags including carry-on
‚Ä¢ International flights: Often 1-2 free checked bags depending on destination

Bag weight limits are typically 50 lbs (23 kg) for checked bags. Size restrictions vary by airline.

Yes, many airlines offer student discounts! Here's what you should know:

‚Ä¢ StudentUniverse and STA Travel offer verified student discounts (10-30% off)
‚Ä¢ Airlines like Lufthansa, Air France, and American sometimes have student fares
‚Ä¢ You'll need a valid student ID to qualify
‚Ä¢ Most student discounts apply to international flights
‚Ä¢ Some airlines offer additional baggage allowance for students

When searching, always check for student/youth fares or use student discount sites.

I can help you with:

‚Ä¢ Finding the best time to book flights
‚Ä¢ Providing information about airlines
‚Ä¢ Explaining baggage policies
‚Ä¢ Checking for student discounts

To get started, try saying something like "When is the best time to fly from New York to Miami?" or "Tell me about baggage fees."
I'll reset our conversation. What would you like to know about flight prices?
Let's search for another flight. Where are you flying from?
Great! I'm glad I could help with your flight planning. Feel free to chat again when you're ready to book your next trip. Safe travels! ‚úàÔ∏è
Thanks for using FlightSavvy! Have a great trip, and come back when you're planning your next adventure. Safe travels! ‚úàÔ∏è

I didn't quite understand. I can help you find the best time to book flights, provide information about airlines, or explain baggage policies. Try asking something like "When should I book my flight from Chicago to Miami?" or type "help" for more options.

<?@airline == 'Southwest'? 'Southwest Airlines (WN) is known for its flexible policies including 2 free checked bags, no change fees, and open seating. They typically offer competitive fares but don\'t appear on most flight search engines - you\'ll need to check their website directly.' : @airline == 'Delta'? 'Delta Air Lines (DL) is a premium carrier with an extensive global network. They offer a tiered fare structure with Basic Economy as their lowest fare. Delta is known for reliability but typically charges for checked bags unless you have elite status or their co-branded credit card.' : @airline == 'American'? 'American Airlines (AA) is one of the largest airlines globally with hubs across the US. They offer Basic Economy fares as their cheapest option but with restrictions. First checked bag typically costs $30 unless you have elite status or their co-branded credit card.' : @airline == 'United'? 'United Airlines (UA) offers extensive domestic and international routes. Their Basic Economy is their lowest fare option but comes with restrictions. Checked bags typically cost $35 for the first bag unless you have elite status or their co-branded credit card.' : @airline == 'Spirit'? 'Spirit Airlines (NK) is an ultra-low-cost carrier that offers very low base fares but charges for nearly everything else, including seat selection, carry-ons, printed boarding passes, and refreshments. They\'re best for travelers who can pack light and don\'t need extras.' : @airline == 'Frontier'? 'Frontier Airlines (F9) is a budget carrier with low base fares and fees for most extras. Their "Discount Den" membership program offers reduced fares for subscribers. Frontier charges for both carry-on and checked bags, with prices increasing as your departure date approaches.' : @airline == 'JetBlue'? 'JetBlue (B6) offers more legroom than most domestic carriers in standard economy and free Wi-Fi on all flights. Their lowest fare class is called "Blue Basic." They charge for checked bags unless you have their co-branded credit card or elite status.' : @airline == 'Alaska'? 'Alaska Airlines (AS) has a strong presence on the West Coast with a growing national network. They\'re known for good service and a solid frequent flyer program. First checked bag costs $30 unless you have elite status or their co-branded credit card.' : 'I don\'t have specific information about that airline. Would you like to know about another major carrier, or should we continue with your flight search?' ?>

<?$conversation_stage == 'collecting_origin'? 'Now, let\'s continue with your flight search. Where are you flying from?' : $conversation_stage == 'collecting_destination'? 'Let\'s continue with your flight search. Where are you flying to?' : $conversation_stage == 'collecting_travel_period'? 'Let\'s continue with your flight search. When are you planning to travel?' : $conversation_stage == 'collecting_airline'? 'Let\'s continue with your flight search. Do you have a preferred airline?' : $conversation_stage == 'collecting_passenger_type'? 'Let\'s continue with your flight search. Are you traveling as an adult, child, or student?' : $conversation_stage == 'collecting_analysis_type'? 'Let\'s continue with your flight search. What level of price analysis would you prefer: monthly, quarterly, weekly, or daily?' : 'Would you like to search for another flight?' ?>

description: A travel assistant chatbot that helps users find the best time to book flights
name: FlightSavvy-Chatbot
